Author: bhb
Title: Capturing your start-to-be with a wiki

Author: pg
Content: I don't believe they have 1400 applicants.  I think that must be a misunderstanding; that may be the number of people who'd asked for info about it.

Author: msgbeepa
Title: How To Become Rich From Making A Simple Video - Part 2

Author: pg
Content:
Why pre-announce it? To prevent people from using competitors in the meantime. Why the need to do that? Because Adobe is genuinely afraid of those competitors.

MSFT used to do this a lot. It doesn't require you to actually have something in 6 months; if people wait, you've achieved your goal. I'm surprised Arrington bought it.

Author: papersmith
Content: I'd be nice to have permalinks of comments in the profile page, and ideally a notification when there's a reply.

Author: papersmith
Content: Maybe feature requests should be a subreddit of its own?  There's so much going on here, I can't tell if the feature on my mind is already mentioned.
